nodes.text: Cona was a desert planet located in the galaxy's Inner Rim that was the homeworld of the Arcona species. Hem Dazon, a male Arcona frequently spent time in the Mos Eisley cantina after becoming stranded on Tatooine. He was unable to return to his home planet because he had spent all his credits on salt and juri juice.
Cona was first mentioned in Star Wars canon in Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game, published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2016.
In Star Wars Legends, Cona was first mentioned in Galaxy Guide 4: Alien Races, a supplement written by Troy Denning for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game, that was released in 1989.
